text: Christian X (26 September 1870 – 20 April 1947) was King of Denmark from 1912 until his death in 1947. He was also the only King of Iceland as Kristján X, being king because of the shared monarchy with Denmark and Iceland between 1918 and 1944. He was a member of the House of Glücksburg. Category:1870 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Kings and Queens of Denmark
title: Christian X
